definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: belt, gridle (distinct fr. [[אֵזוֹר]] waist-cloth, Che:Je, in Pulpit Comm. (1883) 333; Jerem., Life and Times (1888) 161 RS:JQ Jan. 1892, 289 ff.)—[[חֲגוֹר]] for sword 2Sa 20:8 (yet rd. prob. [[חָגוּר]], Th We Klo Dr), cf. 1Sa 18:4; article of commerce Pr 31:24 (coll.? or of a richly adorned girdle?).
